column4: in gnome-control-center there a tool to set wacom settings, how do i start it from CLI?
how can i do manually what the wacom config tool normally does?
i want to write a small script to rotate the screen of my tabletpc
the LCD is not a problem, its the wacom thats the prob
i jsut need a way to do what the wacom GUI config tool thing does
this config thing in ubuntu for wacom tablets has an invert option
see if the gui program can be run from command line.
i was doing that, but it can't
find another program that works with wacom?
erm why? all programs work fine with wacom
I mean to invert it from command line.
yeah i tried that too, no luck either :(
so far its a giant mistery how/what is driving the wacom
i bet if i knew that, i could figure the rest out myself
